sentences.en: a collection of essays edited by John Gay
sentences.cn: 由约翰·盖伊编辑的论文集

sentences.en: Edit the input text and re-run the software.
sentences.cn: 修改输入的文本，重新运行软件。

sentences.en: He taught me to edit and splice film.
He undertook to edit the text himself.
sentences.cn: 他答应亲自编辑正文的内容。

sentences.en: However, if the desired values are finite, the text edit control should not be used.
sentences.cn: 但是如果所需的值是有限的, 就不应该使用文本编辑控件.

sentences.en: I know that this draft text will need to be edited.
sentences.cn: 我知道这篇草稿需要校订。

sentences.en: I used to edit the college paper in the old days.
sentences.cn: 以前我曾经做过大学校报的主编。

sentences.en: In this case, a text edit control is probably unavoidable even though its use is bounded.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 文本编辑控件可能无法避免,即使其用途有限.

sentences.en: It is not yet decided who will edit it.
Special edit modes are almost always examples of excise.
sentences.cn: 它应该位于可编辑字段中,用户单击后可以直接更改它,特殊的编辑模态几乎都是附加工作.

sentences.en: The newspaper edits letters before printing them.
sentences.cn: 这家报社刊登读者来信前先作校订。

sentences.en: The purpose of the edit is fairly simple—to chop out the boring bits from the original.
sentences.cn: 编辑的目的非常简单——删掉原稿中那些无用的部分。

sentences.en: Then I'd edit his copy , and we'd go back and forth.
sentences.cn: 然后由我审编他写的稿子, 我们两个人反复推敲.

sentences.en: They are going to edit books for use in school.
sentences.cn: 他们准备编辑学校用书.

sentences.en: Three CBS cameramen were on site to shoot and edit taped reports.
sentences.cn: 3名哥伦比亚广播公司的摄影记者在现场拍摄并编辑录像报道。

sentences.en: Two girls were chosen to edit the class bulletin.
sentences.cn: 选了两个女孩主编班级小报.

sentences.en: You can write and edit an illustrated composition on your personal computer.
sentences.cn: 你可以在你个人用的计算机上写或编一篇带插图的作文.

sentences.en: You'll have to edit that tape, it's too long.
sentences.cn: 那盘录音带太长, 你得把它剪辑一下.

words.tran_cn: 以编辑身份地；以社论形式
编者，编辑；社论撰写人；编辑装置
编辑；校订；编辑或主笔地位

trans.tran_en: to prepare a book, piece of film etc for printing or broadcasting by removing mistakes or parts that are not acceptable
to prepare a book, piece of film etc for printing or broadcasting by removing mistakes or parts that are not acceptable
